annotations:
Looking for TCT within Pacific area  :
Prefer re-delvy Vietnam – S China range ( can try S’pore – Japan range )
Open Campha  6-7 Sept 2024 iagw,wp wog
27 Aug : ETA Hongkong
29 Aug : ETA Cam Pha
Discharge around 8 days iagw
6-7 Sept : ETCD iagw
BOD about 1380mt/90mt vlsfo/mgo
Aussie /  BHP fitted.
M/V THE HARMONY
Ex.Name: Cetus Ocean
BUILT JAN 2013
Bulk Carrier (88 BC)
FLAG: PANAMA
CLASS : ABS
BUILDER: SANOYAS SHIPBUILDING CORPORATION
DWT/DRAFT : ABT 82,986 MT ON 14.648 M SSW
LOA/BEAM : 229.0 M / 32.24 M
GT/NT : 43,656 T / 27,221 T
GRAIN CAPA: 95,891.7 M3 (including hatch space)
H/H : 7/7
TPC : abt 71.37 MT
HATCH COVER: SIDE ROLLING
HATCH SIZE:
NO.1: 16.80 M X 13.36 M
NO.2 ~ 7: 17.20 M X 15.03 M
ALL DETAILS ABOUT
SPEED AND CONSUMPTION (ON AVERAGE)
AT PORT CONSUMPTION
IDLE VLFO(380CST) ABT 2.5 MT VLFO/DAY + MDO ABT 0.1 MT/DAY
WORKING VLFO(380CST) ABT 4.5 MT VLFO /DAY + MDO ABT 0.1 MT/DAY
AT SEA CONSUMPTION
Eco speed/consumption
M.E @74 RPM 57% LOAD
Ballast about 13 Knots on about 23.5 MT VLFO 380(CST) + about 0.1 MT MDO
Laden about 12 Knots on about 24.5 MT VLFO 380(CST) + about 0.1 MT MDO
Full Speed/ consumption
M.E @84 RPM 85% LOAD
Ballast about 14.5 Knots on about 36.5 MT VLFO 380(CST) + about 0.1 MT MDO
Laden about 13.5 Knots on about 37 MT VLFO 380(CST) + about 0.1 MT MDO
SPEED AND CONSUMPTION BASIS GOOD WEATHER CONDITIONS, NO ADVERSE CURRENT, NO NEGATIVE INFLUENCE OF SWELL AND NOT EXCEEDING BEUFORT SCALE FORCE 4 AND DOUGLAS SEA STATE SCALE 3.
VESSEL HAS THE LIBERTY TO CONSUME ADDITIONAL FUEL OIL/GAS OIL WHEN: UNDER PILOTAGE, WHILE CHANGING BALLAST WATER AT SEA, WHEN BALLASTING/DEBALLASTING, WHEN CLEAN VESSEL'S HOLDS, WHEN NAVIGATING/MANOEUVRING IN CONFINED/SHALLOW/CONGESTED/RESTRICTED WATERS, RIVERS, CHANNELS, WHEN NAVIGATING IN FOG, WHEN BURNING SLUDGE OIL BY INCINERATOR ETC.
SPEED/CONSUMPTION IS ALWAYS GIVEN ON ABOUT BASIS. ANY GAIN ON TIME OR CONSUMPTION SAVED ON PERFORMANCES TO BE OFFSET AGAINST ANY LOSS OF TIME OR OVER-CONSUMPTION.
Hoa Phat Shipping JSC
C/O HOA PHAT TRADING INTERNATIONAL PTE. LTD
Address : 50 Raffles Place, Singapore Land Tower, #38-03,
Singapore 048623
Edwin Lee
Chartering Manager
Mobile / Skype : +6583839783
